name: Hamster Town
description:
Hamsters visit flower gardens, look after hamster babies, chase soccer balls and cubes, and go courting. 

Now with two modes

  • Play: up to 3 players can move objects around
  • Walk: first person can walk around Hamster Town and watch their antics

Made in 2018 by Jayne Gale and Jacob Grossman 

Hampo character copyright Jacob Grossman
